ygData.msgSnippet: Battera:; She took the gun and watched as Cybershark left the cave. She sighed.  She wished things had worked out differently for them. She looked at Vulios.

Battera:;

She took the gun and watched as Cybershark left the cave. She 
sighed.  She wished things had worked out differently for them.
She looked at Vulios. "Well, it's just you and me for a little while 
then.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     The time was drawing close, he needed to move quickly. He 
looked at Battera.
>     "I need to go," He said to her. "Please stay here until I 
return, I am going to get some more supplies, this could be a very 
nice temporary home."
>     He got up, took his gun and handed it to her. "In case he gets 
to rude."
>     He walked out of the cave and off to the right. Once he was 
sure he was out of view he cloaked and transformed to flight mode. 
Then he took off towards the Destron base.
